problem.markdown:
>>Why is station 4’s maximum utilization less than 100% (slide 101)? << ( ) Because there are not enough machines in station 4. ( ) Because the processing time of station 4 is too low. ( ) Because station 4 is starved. (x) Because the entire system’s production is limited by another station that is used more frequently than station 4, and that other system has reached 100% utilization.
[explanation] Parts need to go to station 2 more often than the other stations, or they need to spend more time there. As N increases, the only limit on the utilizations of the stations is 100%, which is reached by Station 2 because it is the most utilized. Other less utilized stations never reach 100% as a result. [explanation]
